name: Explico
goal: Explico is an independent, public affairs consultancy boutique based in CEE, specialised for TMT and energy industries. We provide easy and effective solutions to policy matters for our clients in the wider digital and energy industry, by helping them to find the right messages and effective communication towards public stakeholders. We are based in Hungary, however our business covers the CEE region.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: ICT, Technology, Digital, TMT, Audio-visual and Media Regulation, Information Society, Environmental Affairs, Renewable Energy, Agriculture and Rural Development, Internal Market.
customers: Hunarian Bioetanol Association and its members, Pannonia Ethanol Private Limited Company and Hungrana Limited Liability Company
